page.title: 07DAY IN THE LIFE OF ALEX BELL
page.content: My real name is Alexandra but I like to be called Alex for short. I am a nine year old school girl and I have an older brother called Justin. I go to Geddington School. When I get up in the morning I go downstairs and my mum makes the breakfast while I am watching Popeye on television. Then I go back upstairs to get washed and dressed. I wear my school uniform. When I am finished I walk to school with my friend. My teacher is Mrs Spooner who is very nice. We have 3 playtimes. After school I go home and watch the television. When I've eaten I get changed and call for Lucy. We usually go for a bike ride or go down to the brook. Then I go home, have my supper and watch television. Then I go to bed at 8.30pm.
